title: 384: Influencer’s Hell at Coachella + Johnny Depp’s Nurse + More!
itunes:title: 384: Influencer’s Hell at Coachella + Johnny Depp’s Nurse + More!
description:
(CW: substance abuse and domestic violence) Today The Broads are joined by the incredible Sophie James (aka Unpaid Emotional Labor) to chat pop culture news…but first they chat blonde Bekah auditioning for The Bachelor again, Jess being in the ER, getting bigger boobs through prayer, and visiting church. Then Sophie joins them and they discuss the “nightmare” Revolve event at Coachella, Sherri Papini pleading guilty, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard in court, Depp’s nurse, and more!

 

SOPHIE JAMES aka UNPAID EMOTIONAL LABOR:

***Join Sophie’s Patreon here: https://www.patreon.com/unpaid_emotional_labor

***Follow Sophie here: https://www.instagram.com/sophie_e_james/ 

***Follow Unpaid Emotional Labor pod page here: https://www.instagram.com/unpaidemotionallabor/ 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***OSEA: Get 10% off your first order with code CHATTYBROADS at OSEAMALIBU.COM + free samples with every order + orders over $50 get free shipping!

***TALKSPACE: Sign up today at TALKSPACE.COM and get $100 off your first month with code CHATTY

***FRAMEBRIDGE: Go to FRAMEBRIDGE.COM and use code CHATTYBROADS to save an additional 15% off your first order!
